item.name: Remap forced logout
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::I, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND

item.name: Remap Cmd H - Hide
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, VK_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::P, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND
